key.name: style
key.description: If enabled, updates will automatically be downlaoded and installed. If disabled, updates will still be downloaded, but the user will be asked to install them manually.

key.name: background-color-top
key.description: The primary background color of the panel (top of gradient). Should be formatted properly to be parsed by gdk_rgba_parse ().

key.name: background-color-bottom
key.description: The primary background color of the panel (bottom of gradient). Should be formatted properly to be parsed by gdk_rgba_parse ().
